body:
Spectacular 5* Rhodes beach resort

Lindian Village Beach Resort Rhodes, Curio Collection by Hilton, Greek Islands

From

£166

£238

per room per night

Up to

-30%

Property details

Embrace luxe Greek Island living at an impressive five-star resort in Rhodes, with stunning interiors and a sprawling private beach - includes breakfast, dinner and a welcome drink, plus suite and family-friendly options
  • Five-star designer digs: A supremely aesthetic, minimalist-chic haven, the five-star Lindian Village Beach Resort Rhodes, Curio Collection by Hilton is the ultimate Rhodes retreat. Step inside for gorgeous design-led décor, while outside 60 acres of landscaped grounds, cobbled alleyways and radiant bougainvillea will lead you to the resort's crown jewel - a private stretch along the magnificent Blue Flag-awarded Lardos Beach.

  • Foodie moments: Boasting no fewer than five restaurants, two bars and an on-site gelateria, there's something to tickle all taste buds here. Start your day with a hearty buffet breakfast at Estia Comfort Dining and return later on for comfort food classics, or head elsewhere to sample gourmet Greek offerings, Rhodian specialties, trattoria-style Italian eats and elegant Asian cuisine. Stick around the beach for scrumptious light bites from the food truck, and enjoy stylish island-inspired sundowners at the casual Bliss Bar.

  • Island wellness: When you aren't whiling away the hours on the beach, the resort's lavish spa is the perfect place to decompress. Pamper yourself with a sea-view beauty treatment in the outdoor pavilion, and sample other top-notch offerings like herbal baths and aromatherapy. The spa's sumptuous treatment rooms are a sanctuary of calm, so why not hit refresh in a couples' massage room while the kids are at play?

Amenities

- Wi-Fi
- Five restaurants and two bars
- Private beach area
- Outdoor pool
- Spa and wellness facilities (fees apply)
- Fitness centre
- Activities (fees may apply)
- Water sports facilities (fees apply)
- Kids' club
- 24-hour front desk
- Concierge service
- Shuttle service (fees apply)
- Shopping area
- Parking (see 'Offer details') 
- Pets are not allowed

How to get there

Located along Lardos Beach on the island's southeastern coast, Lindian Village Beach Resort Rhodes, Curio Collection by Hilton will be about an hour's drive from Rhodes Airport.

Good to know

To stay informed about how the UK leaving the EU could affect you when travelling in Europe, and the steps you need to take, please visit the Foreign and Commonwealth Office website.

Entry requirements


The passport, visa and health requirements (including those related to COVID-19) at the time of booking can be viewed on the Foreign and Commonwealth Office website. It is your responsibility to ensure that you and all members of your party are in possession of all necessary travel and health documents, and in compliance with any other immigration/entry requirements, before you travel.

Entry requirements


The passport, visa and health requirements (including those related to COVID-19) at the time of booking can be viewed on the Foreign and Commonwealth Office website. It is your responsibility to ensure that you and all members of your party are in possession of all necessary travel and health documents, and in compliance with any other immigration/entry requirements, before you travel.

Location and what's nearby

Lardos Beach, Lardos 851 09, Greece

Lindian Village Beach Resort Rhodes, Curio Collection by Hilton is located in the pretty village of Lardos, which sports a sprawling Blue Flag beach lined with idyllic tavernas. Stick around your stylish base for a packed agenda of activities and excursions, from thrilling water sports to immersive cultural activities and live entertainment.

A short drive will take you to the quaint whitewashed town of Lindos, famed for its hilltop acropolis, 14th-century castle and vast sandy beach. Elsewhere, Rhodes City's Old Town is a must-see UNESCO World Heritage Site, where a leisurely stroll will take you past a glittering marina, imposing medieval architecture and plenty of shops, bars and restaurants.

Offers and Availability

Cancellation policy

Unlimited free date changes up to 8 days before you check-in.
You can also cancel within this time period and get a refund in Secret Escapes credit, minus a £35 cancellation fee.
